column2: ENGLISH
You can choose to formally introduce your heir to the vassals of your realm. This can help build trust that will certainly prove useful for the child in the future.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to have [This.GetHerHis] father to recognize [This.GetHerHis] legitimacy, and thus grant [This.GetHerHim] a proper inheritance.
Be Legitimized
Groom Your Heir

[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to prepare [This.GetHerHis] heir, [This.Heir.GetTitledFirstName], for [This.Heir.GetHerHis] eventual rule over the [This.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]. This is a process that can potentially take years, culminating in the eventual presentation of an adult heir to the ruler's court.
[From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] wants [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] to realize that [This.GetBestName] does not deserve [This.GetHerHis] position on the council.
Plot to Discredit
Discredit [This.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]
[From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] wants to help [From.GetHerHim]self to an adequate reward for [From.GetHerHis] service to [This.GetBestName].
Embezzle From [This.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]
Plot to Embezzle
[From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] wants to convince [This.RelHead.GetBestName] that [This.GetBestName] is a heretic.
Plot to Fabricate Heresy
Accuse [This.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] of Heresy
[From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] wants to convince the realm that [This.GetBestName] is a traitor.
Plot to Fabricate Treason
Fabricate Evidence of [This.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]'s Treason
Plot to Fabricate Treason
[From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] wants to convince the realm that [This.GetBestName] is a traitor.
Fabricate Evidence of [This.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]'s Treason

With [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] incapable of ruling, [From.GetBestName] intends to formalize [From.GetHerHis] position as regent and take over the actual rule of the [From.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName].\n\n§YNOTE: This is not an easy thing to do, even for an heir, and will require both high Plot Power and at least three backers before it can even think of being successful.§!
Plot to Usurp
Usurp Titles
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided that kidnapping is the only way to make [This.GetTitledFirstName] give up some of [This.GetHerHis] land.
Plot to Kidnap
Abduct [This.GetTitledFirstName]

[From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] intends to abduct [This.GetBestName]. This would allow [From.GetHerHim] to demand a claimed or de jure non-capital county that [This.GetFirstName] holds, or a vassal that [From.GetSheHe] feels is rightly [From.GetHersHis] (these options are only available if [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] and [This.GetTitledFirstName] are fellow vassals in the same realm)-- or perhaps simply to let [This.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] rot in [From.GetHerHis] dungeon.
Plot to Kidnap
Kidnap [This.GetTitledFirstName]

With [This.Liege.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] unable to rule, [This.GetBestName] currently acts in [This.Liege.GetHerHis] stead on matters of the [This.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]. [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] believes [From.GetSheHe] would be far better suited for the task, and plans to arrange a challenge in court.
Plot to Replace as Regent
Replace Regent
[From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] will see [This.GetBestName] dead for what [This.GetSheHe] has done.
Plot to Take Revenge
Take Revenge on [This.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]
Is Actually My Child
Attempted Kidnapping
Attempted Kidnapping of Kin
Attempted Kidnapping of Vassal
Devious Schemer
Kidnapped Me
Legitimized Me
Attempted Blackmail
Kidnapped a Relative
Kidnapped Me
Upset at Upbringing
Scandal
Spied Upon
Spied Upon
Spied Upon
Spied Upon
Spy Reports

The detailed reports from your spies will greatly assist with your current plot, both in terms of plot power and the amount of time it takes for the plot to come to fruition, as well as your chance of unearthing plots against you.
Spy Reports

The detailed reports from your spies will greatly assist with your current plot, both in terms of plot power and the amount of time it takes for the plot to come to fruition, as well as your chance of unearthing plots against you.
Spy Reports

The detailed reports from your spies will greatly assist with your current plot, both in terms of plot power and the amount of time it takes for the plot to come to fruition, as well as your chance of unearthing plots against you.
Spy Reports

The detailed reports from your spies will greatly assist with your current plot, both in terms of plot power and the amount of time it takes for the plot to come to fruition, as well as your chance of unearthing plots against you.
Spy Reports

The detailed reports from your spies will greatly assist with your current plot, both in terms of plot power and the amount of time it takes for the plot to come to fruition, as well as your chance of unearthing plots against you.
Replace Regent Timer
Replace Regent Timer
Seduction Timer
Seduction Timer
Spy On Timer
Spy On Timer
Sympathetic
[This.GetTitledFirstName] is accused of treason by [From.GetTitledName]\n
Acknowledge [This.GetHerHim] as your bastard child
Ask him if he is your real father
Ask to be recognized as his legitimate child
Give [From.GetTitledFirstName] an estate off of which to live
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] was declared a legitimate child of [From.GetTitledName].
The kidnapping is a success\n
We fail, but are not discovered\n
Disaster strikes – the plot fails and we're found out\n
[From.GetTitledFirstName] successfully embezzles money from [This.GetTitledName]\n
Agree to the blackmail demand
Send a blackmail demand, lest you let everyone know of his indiscretion
Send a blackmail demand, lest you let everyone know of [target_spy_on.GetHerHis] indiscretion
Refuse the blackmail demand, no matter the consequences
Reveal [hidden_bastard.GetTitledFirstName] to be a bastard
Continue spying on [target_spy_on.GetTitledName]\n
Realizes that you were behind the attempt
The attempt to enflame the rivalry fails, but you are not revealed\n
The attempt to enflame the rivalry succeeds\n
The attempt to enflame the rivalry fails, and your role is revealed to one or both parties\n
Send word that your information can be used in the plot against [target_spy_on.GetTitledFirstName]
Send word of the plot against [From.PlotTarget.GetHerHim]
Relations with [target_spy_on.GetHerHis] liege are unaffected\n
Relations with [target_spy_on.GetHerHis] liege are unaffected, and either party may discover your attempt\n
Relations with [target_spy_on.GetHerHis] liege are worsened\n
Cease all spying attempts against [target_spy_on.GetTitledName]\n
[Root.Heir.GetTitledFirstName] has been successfully groomed and presented to your court\n
[This.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] begins to spend time at court\n
Introduce your heir at court
Will be forced to decide whether to kill you
Demand that [demanded_title.GetName] be turned over to you, or face the consequences
Demand that [demanded_vassal.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] be turned over to you, or face the consequences
You will be set free\n
The murder is discovered by [kidnap_victim.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]'s spymaster
The murder is discovered by [kidnap_victim.Liege.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]'s spymaster
No one discovers who murdered [kidnap_victim.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]\n
Will be set free--and will be very angry!
Declare [This.GetHerHim] your legitimate child
Is either not Chaste or is unmarried and without a lover\n
Has not recently been the target of spying\n
The plot succeeds
The plot fails, but is not discovered
The plot fails and is discovered
Will be successfully blocked from continuing [From.GetHerHis] plan to take the regency.
Will continue [From.GetHerHis] plans, unaffected by your efforts.
Your plans backfire, and [From.GetHerHis] plans will likely come to fruition much more quickly.
An attempt to seduce has not occurred recently\n
[This.GetTitledName] is discredited in front of the court\n
The attempt to usurp [Root.Liege.GetTitledName]'s titles will fail, but will cause no undue reaction.
The attempt to usurp [Root.Liege.GetTitledName]'s titles will fail, and will be revealed as treachery.
All of [Root.Liege.GetTitledName]'s titles will be successfully usurped.
Reveal the truth to all that will listen.

Finally, an opportunity has arisen to abduct [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] when [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] takes a planned journey from [Root.PlotTarget.Location.GetName] to a nearby town. Shall I tell my co-conspirators to begin their preparations?

Finally, an opportunity to abduct [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] has arisen. One of the [Root.PlotTarget.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]'s personal guard has proven amenable to bribery, allowing for the opportunity to take [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHim] while [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] sleeps. Shall I tell my co-conspirators to begin their preparations?

Finally, an opportunity has arisen to abduct [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] when [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] goes on a planned hunting trip over a week from now. The perfect chance to catch [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHim] away from court! Shall I tell my co-conspirators to begin their preparations?

Finally, an opportunity to abduct [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] has arisen. The [Root.PlotTarget.GetManWoman]'s amourous nature has betrayed [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHim]--a planned trip to a brothel in [Root.PlotTarget.Location.GetName] will prove the perfect chance, if we move quickly. Shall I tell my co-conspirators to begin their preparations?
We must proceed with the plan!
Not yet, this is too risky
At last, after having watched our target here in [Root.Location.GetName] for so long, an opportunity for abduction has arisen. I must tell the others at once!
With luck, this will be over soon

My dear [Root.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal],
It seems the opportunity to abduct [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] is finally upon us. I ask that you stand ready to make your move. If we fail this chance, it will not come again quickly.

My thanks,
[From.GetTitledName]

My co-conspirators send word that they have prepared everything we need to discredit [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]. Documents of [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] corruption have been prepared, and courtiers have been bribed to whisper to [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] of [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis]'s incompetence. With [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] reputation in tatters, [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] will find it impossible to hold on to [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] position on the council.
That position will be mine!

I have found myself the target of a vicious campaign of slander at court. Rumors of incompetence and corruption have undermined the authority of my position, and it seems that even [Root.Liege.GetTitledName] have come to believe them as I have been removed from my position at the council.
I am ruined!

The attempt to discredit [From.GetTitledFirstName] was a success! [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] has dismissed [From.GetHerHim] from the council and [From.GetHerHis] position is now vacant and ready for me to occupy.
Excellent!

Lately it seems that I have heard nothing but bad of [From.GetTitledFirstName], from whispers of incompetence at court to documents proving [From.GetHerHis] corruption slipped under my bedroom door at night. I refused to believe it at first, but in the end I could not deny the weight of the evidence and was forced to remove [From.GetTitledFirstName] from [From.GetHerHis] position at court.
It had to be done

I have found myself the target of a vicious campaign of slander at court. Whispers of incompetence and accusations of corruption have been directed at me, but fortunately [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] has refused to give them credence and ordered an investigation into the source of the rumors. Although the investigation turned up nothing, my position at court is secure.
Who could have instigated such an underhanded scheme?

Despite the rumors and accusations directed at [From.GetTitledFirstName], [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] refused to dismiss [From.GetHerHim] from the council and has ordered an investigation into the source of the rumors. Fortunately, the investigation turned up no evidence of my involvement.
It could have been worse...

Lately it seems that I have heard nothing but bad of [From.GetTitledFirstName], from whispers of incompetence at court to documents proving [From.GetHerHis] corruption slipped under my bedroom door at night. A thorough questioning of the court turned up nothing, but has at least put a stop to the slanderous accusations.

I have found myself the target of a vicious campaign of slander at court. Whispers of incompetence and accusations of corruption have been directed at me, but fortunately [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] refused to give them credence and ordered an investigation into their source, which revealed the involvement [From.GetTitledName]...
[From.GetTitledFirstName] will pay for this!

Despite the rumors and accusations directed at [From.GetTitledFirstName], [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] refused to dismiss [From.GetHerHim] from the council. Even worse, [Root.Liege.GetFirstName] ordered an investigation into the source of the rumors, which turned up evidence of my involvement...
[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] is not pleased...

Lately it seems that I have heard nothing but bad of [From.GetTitledFirstName], from whispers of incompetence at court to documents proving [From.GetHerHis] corruption slipped under my bedroom door at night. I refused to believe the accusations and ordered an investigation of their source, which revealed the involvement of [FromFrom.GetTitledName].
[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] will pay for this!

The tithes and taxes for [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] are on their way to [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] castle and my co-conspirators have bribed the guards not to notice if a chest or two should go 'missing'. Everything is ready for the robbery to proceed.
We'll all be rich!

The taxes and tithes due to me arrived at the castle today and were placed in the treasury. As I was inspecting the chests full of gold, it struck me that there seemed to be fewer of them than what had arrived earlier. A quick check of the treasurer's accounts revealed my worst fears...
I have been robbed!

As the taxes were being hauled into the treasury, several large chests full of gold made their way onto the back of a wagon which left the castle unnoticed. The gold is now safely locked away in my treasury and my co-conspirators have all received their share.
Everything went as planned!
I have received my share of the money embezzled by [From.GetTitledFirstName] from [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName].

The taxes and tithes due to me arrived at the castle today. As the coin was being carried into the treasury, some shadowy figures attempted to make off with several chests full of gold...and they would have gotten away had my guards not been alert. The figures were seized and, under questioning, revealed themselves to be in the employ of [From.GetTitledFirstName].
Unbelieveable!

As the taxes were being hauled into the treasury, my men tried to make off with several chests of gold but were spotted by [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s guards and seized. Under questioning they revealed to myself to be in my employ, and now [From.GetTitledFirstName] knows that I attempted to rob [From.GetHerHim].
Retribution is sure to come...

My co-conspirators have fabricated evidence that [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] is planning a revolt against [Root.PlotTarget.Liege.GetHerHis] liege. The evidence will discreetly find its way into the hands of [Root.PlotTarget.Liege.GetTitledFirstName], who cannot fail to act on it.
I will see [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHim] disgraced!
Word has reached me that [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] has publicly accused me of treason based on evidence found in some documents that were slipped under [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] bedroom door.
This must be a scheme to see me arrested!
[From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] was completely fooled by the fabricated evidence of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s treason. It can only be a matter of time before [From.GetSheHe] is arrested.

As I rose from bed, I found a small bundle of documents that had been slipped beneath my bedroom door. The documents contained evidence of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s plans to depose me and seize my titles.
I must have [From.GetHerHim] arrested!

As I rose from bed, I found a small bundle of documents that had been slipped beneath my bedroom door. The documents contained evidence of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s plans to depose me and seize my titles.
I wonder who sent it...
[From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] refused to believe the fabricated evidence of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s treason. Although the scheme has failed, at least there is no evidence of my involvement.

As I rose from bed, I found a small bundle of documents that had been slipped beneath my bedroom door. The documents contained evidence of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s plans to depose me and seize my titles.
Nothing but lies and slander

[From.GetTitledFirstName] tried to have me arrested for treason by slipping fabricated 'evidence' under [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]'s bedroom door, but fortunately [Root.Liege.GetSheHe] caught [From.GetHerHis] agent in the act and now it is [From.GetTitledFirstName] that stands accused of treason.
How dare [From.GetSheHe]!

My agent was caught in the act of slipping the fabricated evidence under [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]'s bedroom door. Even worse, my involvement was revealed during questioning and now I am the one that stands accused of treason.
This is bad!

As I was getting ready to sleep, I heard a scuffle from outside my bedroom door. Rushing outside, I found that my guards had seized a cloaked man as he was attempting to slip some documents into the room. Under questioning, he revealed that he was working for [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] and that the documents were fabricated evidence intended to turn me against my vassal [From.GetTitledFirstName].
[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] is the true traitor!

My co-conspirators have fabricated evidence of [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName]'s blasphemous conduct and sheltering of heretics. The letter will be sent to [Root.PlotTarget.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName] who will be forced to excommunicate [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHim].
[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] will be my judge!
Word has reached me that [Root.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName] has had me excommunicated based on fabricated 'evidence' of blasphemy and heresy sent to [Root.RelHead.GetHerHim] in an anonymous letter.
[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] preserve me from these lies!

[From.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName] was completely fooled by the fabricated evidence of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s heresy. [From.GetTitledFirstName] has been excommunicated and interdict has been placed on [From.GetHerHis] lands.
It was the will of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]!

Word has reached me that [Root.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName] has received fabricated 'evidence' of blasphemy and heresy sent to [Root.RelHead.GetHerHim] in an anonymous letter. Fortunately, [Root.RelHead.GetSheHe] dismissed it as the slanderous lie it is.
[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] looks after the faithful
[From.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName] refused to believe the fabricated evidence of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s heresy. Although the scheme has failed, at least there is no evidence of my involvement.

Word has reached me that [Root.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName] has received fabricated 'evidence' of blasphemy and heresy sent to [Root.RelHead.GetHerHim] in an anonymous letter. However, [Root.RelHead.GetSheHe] not only refused to believe it, but had the messenger questioned until he revealed the sender of the letter.
It was sent by [From.GetTitledFirstName]!

[From.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName] refused to believe the fabricated evidence of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s heresy. What's worse, [From.RelHead.GetSheHe] had the messenger questioned and found out that I sent it! I have been censured for my 'unseemly scheming' and [From.GetTitledFirstName] knows that I tried to have [From.GetHerHim] excommunicated.
This will not help my reputation...

My co-conspirators have fabricated evidence that [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] is planning a revolt against me. I will circulate the evidence among my vassals so that they will support my actions against the 'traitor'.

Word has reached me that documents indicting me in a plan to revolt against [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] have been circulating through the realm. Though the evidence is obviously a forgery, it seems almost everyone in the realm has been fooled by it, and I fear I am about to be arrested.
Who could have done such a thing?!
My vassals were completely fooled by the fabricated evidence of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s treason. I am now free to act against [From.GetHerHim].

Word has reached me that documents indicting me in a plan to revolt against [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] have been circulating through the realm. Fortunately most of the lords of the realm have dismissed it as the forgery it is.
I wonder who was behind it...
My vassals refused to believe the fabricated evidence of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s treason. Although the scheme has failed, at least there is no evidence of my involvement.

Word has reached me that documents indicting me in a plan to revolt against [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] have been circulating through the realm. One of the forger's agents was caught while handing out the forgeries on my lands, and questioning revealed him to be working for [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName].

My vassals refused to believe the fabricated evidence of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s treason. What's worse, one of my agents was caught and questioned while circulating the forgeries, and my involvement has been revealed to all my vassals.
My reputation is ruined!

Success! [kidnap_victim.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] has been delivered in a sack to an abandoned keep near [kidnap_victim.Location.GetName]. There [kidnap_victim.GetSheHe] is at my mercy, and no-one can hear [kidnap_victim.GetHerHis] screams. All that remains is to decide what to do with [kidnap_victim.GetHerHim].
[kidnap_victim.GetSheHeCap] will give me the [demanded_title.GetFullName], or else!
[kidnap_victim.GetSheHeCap] will name [demanded_vassal.GetTitledName] my vassal, or else!
Bring [kidnap_victim.GetHerHim] to my dungeon--I will decide later
Now [kidnap_victim.GetSheHe] dies--quietly

You are sleeping quite soundly in your bed when you are suddenly rudely awoken by a bag being thrust over your head! You struggle, but it is no use--your captors are strong, and it is not long before you find yourself in the dungeons of [From.GetTitledName]. There, [From.GetSheHe] informs you, you shall remain until [From.GetSheHe] decides otherwise.
[From.GetSheHeCap] will pay for this outrage!

[From.GetTitledName] recently went missing, and after a frantic search by [From.GetHerHis] guards, it seemed as if [From.GetSheHe] had simply vanished into thin air! Not so, apparently. It turns out [From.GetSheHe] was forcibly abducted by agents of [FromFrom.GetTitledName], who intends to keep [From.GetHerHim] in [FromFrom.GetHerHis] dungeons until [FromFrom.GetSheHe] decides otherwise.

You are sleeping quite soundly in your bed when you are suddenly rudely awoken by a bag being thrust over your head! You struggle, but it is no use--your captors are strong, and it is not long before you find yourself in a dungeon. There, [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] reveals [From.GetHerHim]self as your captor, and states you have only to hand over the [demanded_title.GetFullName] to achieve your freedom.
Take it! Just let me go!
[From.GetSheHeCap] will get nothing from me!

[From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] clearly didn't like it, but then again you left [From.GetHerHim] little choice. The [demanded_title.GetFullName] is yours. [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] has not told anyone exactly how you got the title, of course, but there are whispers. Even so, what does it matter now?

While [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] earlier seemed to have no intention of granting the [demanded_title.GetFullName] to anyone, suddenly [From.GetSheHe] changed [From.GetHerHis] mind and granted it to [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]. Could this have something to do with [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]'s recent unexplained absence from [From.Location.GetName]? No-one appears to know for certain.

'You will get nothing from me! Do your worst!' [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] spits in your face, refusing to give into your demands...though you can clearly see the fear in [From.GetHerHis] face. The [From.GetManWoman] is brave, evidently. So now what?
Now [From.GetSheHe] rots in my dungeon
Now [From.GetSheHe] dies--quietly
I'm not going to kill [From.GetHerHim]! Just...let [From.GetHerHim] go

'Then you will remain a guest in my dungeon until I decide just what to do with you,' [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] says with a shrug. With that, [From.GetSheHe] leaves, and you are left in the dark and the cold to wonder whether that was the wisest choice...

After recently vanishing without a trace from [FromFrom.GetHerHis] court, [FromFrom.GetTitledName]'s lifeless corpse was discovered soon afterwards on the bank of a nearby river. People throughout [Root.TopLiege.PrimaryTitle.GetName] are shocked by the scandal, which gets worse when it is revealed that [From.GetTitledName] was behind the deed!

While [From.GetSheHe] appears torn, it turns out that [From.GetSheHe] cannot, in fact, order your death. [From.GetSheHe] turns and walks out, swearing, and some time later you are discovered by a passing peasant and released. You are unharmed!
A relief, but still...

You are sleeping quite soundly in your bed when you are suddenly rudely awoken by a bag being thrust over your head! You struggle, but it is no use--your captors are strong, and it is not long before you find yourself in a dungeon. There, [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] reveals [From.GetHerHim]self as your captor, and states you have only to make [demanded_vassal.GetTitledName] [From.GetHerHis] vassal to achieve your freedom.
Take the vassal, just let me go!

[Root.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal],
I cannot tell you the reasons behind my decision. Simply trust that they exist. With that in mind, I have elected to transfer your vassalage to [FromFrom.GetTitledName], effective immediately. May [From.Religion.GetHighGodName] have mercy upon us all.

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]

[From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] clearly didn't like it, but then again you left [From.GetHerHim] little choice. [demanded_vassal.GetTitledName] is now your vassal. [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] has not told anyone exactly how this arrangement came to be, of course, but there are whispers. Even so, what does it matter now?

While [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] earlier seemed to have no intention of surrendering any of [From.GetHerHis] vassals to [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], suddenly [From.GetSheHe] changed [From.GetHerHis] mind and granted [FromFrom.GetHerHim] lordship over [demanded_vassal.GetTitledName]. Could this have something to do with [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]'s recent unexplained absence from [From.Location.GetName]? No-one appears to know for certain.

Alas, [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] surprised the kidnappers with the ferocity of [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] struggle, and they were forced to flee when [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] guards came running. While an investigation is underway, currently no-one is aware that you were behind the assault.

You are sleeping quite soundly in your bed when you are suddenly rudely awoken by a bag being thrust over your head! Outraged, you struggle--well enough that guards come running, and your kidnappers are forced to flee. Sadly, they escaped...meaning you have no idea who was behind this assault on your person.
Surely SOMEONE must know the truth?!

Disaster! [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] surprised the kidnappers with the ferocity of [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] struggle, and while they fled when guards came running, they were quickly caught. Even worse, the men gave up your name as their employer! You've denied it, naturally, but [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] clearly does not believe you.

You are sleeping quite soundly in your bed when you are suddenly rudely awoken by a bag being thrust over your head! Outraged, you struggle--well enough that guards come running, and your kidnappers are forced to flee. They are quickly caught, and upon questioning give up [From.GetTitledName] as their employer. [From.GetSheHeCap] tried to have you abducted!

Unsettling news—while you currently have no proof of it, you are all but certain that [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] is conspiring with unknown parties to wrest the regency from your grasp. Unless you act soon, [From.GetSheHe] may very well soon succeed.
